title: Electricity supply by realty firms, mall owners, airport operators to attract 18% GST
description: "It is clarified that whenever electricity is being supplied bundled with renting of immovable property and/or maintenance of premises, as the case may be, it forms a part of composite supply and shall be taxed accordingly," CBIC said in a clarification issued on Tuesday.
